overview:
Kenneth has been involved in the web as well as the computer hardware industry for the past 8 years. Developing websites for a wide range of clients he was able to scale his company and became well known for his expertise in the South Miami area. Last year he was able to build a successful affiliate marketing company called Affillion and funded multiple of his projects throughout the year.

In 2010, Kenneth graduated from Florida International University as their first graduate with a Master in Management Information Systems and a Master in Business Administration at the age of 22. Being recognized by the president Dr. Mark Rosenberg he was known as a role model for future students and was recognized as a great entrepreneur by his friends and family.

His current venture is Affillion.com, a private CPA network comprised of elite marketers across the world that bring in the highest quality leads to any advertiser looking to expand their clientele. Affillion has grown to become the top 10 networks in the industry and is working it’s way up to number 1.
